search.title: Search
search.content: By using the quick-search you can either search for countries or cities which will give you a result of registered suppliers in these destinations

results.title: Results
results.content: The search results show a preview with important facts of each company in random order but premium members will appear on top

get_in_touch.title: Get in touch
get_in_touch.content: Send email forms over the RFP tool or simply use the phone or email button to get in contact with suppliers directly

rfp_card.title: RFP-Card
content: Add potential supplier to your RFP-card
Request multiple companies with just one click
Send an email form and get quotations back

favorites_list.title: Favorites List
content: Add potential supplier to your favorites
Safe lists of supplier in your account
Use lists to send RFPs to them
